item.title: Dusk's Warriors, Chapter 17 revised
item.itunes:author: Emerian Rich
item.description:
Dusk's Warriors Chapter 17: Talia learns what it means to fight real demons. Reidar and Julien face off against demons in hell.
Voices by: Mark Eller, Rhonda Carpenter, Dan Shaurette, Ariel DaWintre, Camellia Rains, and Emerian Rich. 
 
Theme music by Factory of Dreams 
For more information on the author, go to http://www.emzbox.com

http://www.liliths-love.com/

item.description:

item.itunes:author: Emerian Rich
item.description:

 Theme music by Factory of Dreams
